page.title: 04 BUYING A COUNCIL HOUSE
page.content: Greenwich council does not think selling houses that belong to the council is a good thing because it means that they have fewer houses for people that need them.They have not a lot of money to build more or the land to build houses with gardens.It is government policy to sell them.Bromley council approves of selling council houses. The houses have not got garages and the roads are too narrow.Many people now have cars and this is causing problems. We think it is nice to be able to buy your own house but we feel sorry for those people in flats or houses in bad condition or without gardens.
